item.title: Los Del Rio - Macarena
item.description:
For educational use. Only 1 Chord Used: G
For a "not-so-simplified" version of this ukulele play along, click here: https://youtu.be/y03Bp1W0tDs.
La Macarena by Los Del Rio. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Original Just Dance Unlimited Video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=Nt-0yK9gPv4

item.title: The Mavericks - Dance The Night Away
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy - Ideal For Beginners
Dance The Night Away - The Mavericks
This is one of the first songs we learn as it only has 2 chords. If you feel confident try using C7 instead of C.
In the Key Of F Maj
Using the chords: C F
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
